title: Age of Anxiety (Interwar Period)
summary: The Age of Anxiety was a period between %{World War One#World War One} and %{World War Two#World War Two} where the world was in a state of uncertainty. The world was recovering from the devastation of World War One, and %{the Great Depression# The Great Depression} was looming. The rise of #{fascism} and #{communism} were also on the rise, and the world was on the brink of another world war.
